Cyber attacks against the defense department as well as American-based companies like Google were at the heart of Kirsten Gillibrand 's complaint, prompting her to write that the potentially devastating consequences to the United States illustrate the need to engage this issue at the highest levels of government. The question of China's ability to restrict exports because of their control over REEs is also a problematic one for the Senator because these regulations sometimes force companies to relocate to China in order to access the materials.

On April 11 senior military spokesperson Mark Kimmitt declared, The stations that are showing Americans intentionally killing women and children are not legitimate news sources. That is propaganda, and that is lies. On April 15 Donald Rumsfeld echoed those remarks in distinctly undiplomatic terms, calling Al-Jazeera's reporting "vicious, inaccurate and inexcusable....
